title: Interview: Damien Echols of the "West Memphis Three"
description: We're so excited to share our interview with Damien Echols, author, artist, husband, producer, and wrongfully convicted human. We talk all about West of Memphis, his journey being one of the West Memphis Three, his years on death row, his ongoing fight for exoneration, forgiveness, and so much more! You can learn more about Damien and his art at patreon.com/damienechols
itunes:author: Obsessed Network
dc:creator: Obsessed Network
